That sounds awesome !!! I'm quite excited for you too :) 
Sooo actually i have a question,  you know when you create your environments for shows and such, how do you go about it like do you do research following a brief ? Study from life ?

Thanks!! When I start to work on a environment usually I am provided of a little thumbnail and a 3D sketchup model from my Art Director and Supervisor. Then I start to draw on top of the 3D model: I add a perspective point of view(even if the model is already in perspective) and then I sketch the details on top. If location is complex I can make a photo research for reference
Anyway after the storyboard come to us is good to make a research for location or props before starting sketching!
We don’t have time to do real life studies during production as it’s very fast paced full time job
